ARABIC: مَّا خَلْقُكُمْ وَلَا بَعْثُكُمْ إِلَّا كَنَفْسٍ وَٰحِدَةٍ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your creation and rising is only like that of a single self. Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your creation and resurrection is but like that of a single cell. Verily He is all-hearing and all-seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: To create all of you or to resurrect all of you is to Him like (creating or resurrecting) a single person. Verily Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: For God your creation and your resurrection are only like the creation and resurrection of one soul. God is All-hearing and All-seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Creating you all and raising you from the dead are like that of one soul*; indeed Allah is All Hearing, All Knowing. (He can create you slowly or all at once).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The creation of you all and the resurrection of you all are only as a single person. Verily, Allah is All-Hearer, All-Seer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Neither your creation nor your raising is anything but as a single soul; surely Allah is Hearing, Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Your creation and your upraising are as but as a single soul. God is All-hearing, All-seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Your creation and your raising (from the dead) are only as (the creation and the raising of) a single soul. Lo! Allah is Hearer, Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Creating and resurrecting all of you is just like creating and resurrecting a single soul. Truly, God hears all and observes all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And your creation and your upraising are only as though of one soul; verily Allah is Hearing, Beholding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Your creation and your resurrection are not but as of a single soul. Indeed Allah is all-hearing, all-seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And your creation or your resurrection is in no wise but as an individual soul: for Allah is He Who hears and sees (all things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The creation of you all and the resurrection of you all are only as (the creation and resurrection of) a single person. Verily, Allah is All-Hearer, All-Seer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your creation and your resurrection are but as a single soul. Allah is the Hearer, the Seer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Your creation and your resurrection are only as a single soul. God is Hearing and Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Your creation and your resurrection will not be but as that of a single soul. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [31:28] Your creation and your resurrection are only as [that of] a single soul, in terms of creation and resurrection, because it is the result of the words kun fa-yakūn, ‘“Be!” and it is!’ Truly God is Hearer, hearing everything that may be heard, Seer, seeing everything that may be seen, nothing able to distract Him from anything else.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Your creation) when He created you (and your raising (from the dead)) when He will resurrect you (are only as (the creation and the raising of) a single soul. Lo! Allah is Hearer) He hears you when you say: "how is Allah going to raise us from the dead?", (Seer) of your resurrection.
